Square

Define a square to play in the board This “class” use the method prototype to do define a “class” in javascript

Parameters

xposition x of the square.  For normal use, 0 to 2
yposition y of the square. for normal use, 0 to 2

Board

Define the board of the game

Parameters

playersThe count of the players
